Warnings
  • [AmbiDexter] is now a separate commandline tool which still needs integration
Name Rascal/Declarations/SyntaxDefinition/AmbiguityDetection

Synopsis AmbiDexter is a tool that analyzes SyntaxDefinitions, including their Disambiguations, to try and determine which ambiguities it contains.
Description Static detection of ambiguity is not decidable, nevertheless AmbiDexter does a fine job at finding them.

[AmbiDexter] is now a separate commandline tool which still needs integration
Benefits
  • AmbiDexter can find ambiguity for you before testing the parser, after which you can use DrAmbiguity to explain it.
Pitfalls
  • AmbiDexter is not a silver bullet. It has a time-limit to stop after having searcher only so much of a language. After the time limit has expired, your SyntaxDefinition may still contain Ambiguity.
